name: Growing Prototype
description:
Created as an example for students of Core Systems Studio Games Fa2021

This is the first of 4 System Game Prototypes meant to be made by students. The prompt was "Growth Growth Growth." Students have two weeks to create a game inspired by systems thinking.

No interactivity, just a scene of a growing tree trunk. Unfortunately, not all weeks can be successful! Spent more time with the tree modeling than any other part.

Song is Scott Buckley's SOLACE.
